DOC.brief_summary: This study is to collect the information of Ultravist® in the patients indicated for the coronary angiography or PCI, like rate of ADR in patients, the dose for different indications, image quality to prove Ultravist the good safety and effectivity
DOC.brief_title: The Safety and toleRability of UltraviSt in Patients Undergoing Cardiac CaTheterization (TRUST)
DOC.criteria: Female and male patients who receive Ultravist® for coronary angiography or PCI can be included in the study Patients who are or are suspected in pregnancy or nursery Patients with the contraindications for Ultravist Patients with the contraindications for cardiac catheterization
